'''''Font of All Waters (III)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (III)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must unlock all 24 [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in the following areas: [[Morte Region]] and [[Erinnyes Forest]].

Some Teleport Waypoints can only be accessed upon progressing certain World Quests and exploration, including the following:‍{{Verify|any others?}}
* {{Quest|The Wild Fairy of Erinnyes}}
